data.title: Gerhard's library (books)
data.meta_description: ROBERTO GERHARD'S LIBRARY (books) Last updated October 2013 Handlist of the books transferred from 14 Madingley Road to the University Library in the Summer of 1993, and presented to the University Library by Dr Rosemary Summers in 2008. The Library has retained all the books marked by Roberto Gerhard, and any not otherwise in the Library. The books retained are at the
